name: Black Diamond Super 8 Descender
description: For those who want one device for belaying and rappelling, who prefer the easy lock off of a figure 8 for rapping. The small end can be used to belay like a tube-like belay device (although it can jam occasionally).Made of 7075 anodized aluminum.Tapered at the top for lighterness.In belay mode, use with ropes 8-9 doubles, up to 11 singles.Not meant to be fed as descender for belaying.Rated to 15kN.
